Text: thank you big_dad_e ,, ive been wantin to see this forever..PLEASE SEED, Thank you

This copy looks like crap. Blurry, full of artifacts, terrible color, and it's in a little window in your player. Skip it and get this version: 
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4743349/Caminhos_Perigosos_-_Mean.Streets.1973.Scorsese.DVDRip.XviD-OS.i

Much clearer, better audio, plus subs in Portugese, French, Spanish and Polish, AND alternate audio track with director's commentary from Scorsese!
